LanguageData.WNA_DimBeastRace.label: dim hybeast
LanguageData.WNA_DimBeastRace.description: A strange ball-like creature, created by Whelinghorther Alliance. There's many stories about the detailed origin of such thing, one stated that Alliance used animal corpses to create them.
LanguageData.WNA_DimBeastRace.tools.tendril.label: tendril
LanguageData.WNA_DimBeastRace.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.WNA_DimBeastRace.tools.horn.label: horn
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBeastRace.label: thorn hybeast
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBeastRace.description: A strange ball-like beast, even Whelingnorther Alliance is curious about its origion. It can throw spears to whatever it think is a threat, fast and long range.
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBeastRace.tools.tendril.label: tendril
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBeastRace.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBeastRace.tools.horn.label: horn
